entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • unreliable codegen around vbroadcastss in .NET 8 release builds #96156
  • Add RIDs for Alpine 3.19 #96155
  • PInvokeTests.IEnumeratorTests.TestManagedToNative crash #96154
  • Restore the Microsoft.NETCore.DotNetHsotResolver package as a non-shipping package #96151
  • [Fuzzlyn] Assertion failed '!"Unexpected bbKind"' #96146
    9.0.0
  • [runtime-jit-experimental] Assertion failed 'loops->NumLoops() == 0' #96145
    9.0.0
  • UnixDomainSocketEndPoint no longer constructable on iOS (.NET 8) #96143
  • New SearchValues<string> API doesn't use vectorized equality comparison once it finds a candidate #96142
  • Building runtime on ARM64 uses x86 tools? #96141
    9.0.0
  • failure assigning ulong to decimal #96152
  • About additionalAssemblyPaths in .runtimeconfig.json #96133
  • [API Proposal]: Consider making all implementations of ILogger.BeginScope<TState>(TState) return a non-null value #96128
  • [API Proposal]: Parallel.ForEachAsync with Partitioner support #96126
  • `HasExited` throws Access Denied for the Idle process on Windows #96124
  • [RISCV] Mono RISC-V porting progress tracing #96117
  • KeyedCollection debug view doesn't work #96116
  • Test failure baseservices/exceptions/unhandled/unhandledTester/unhandledTester.cmd #96114

Closed

  • Test failure Loader/classloader/MethodImpl/InternalMethodImplTest/InternalMethodImplTest.dll #96113
  • Runtime event for Monitor.Wait #94264
    Future
  • Native crash in `JIT.Regression` for `mono llvmfullaot Pri0 Runtime Tests Run Linux x64 release` #74588
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Generalize check for cycles when finding loops #96153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • A few optimizations for the gcinfodecoder construction #96150
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] [PERF] Update osx.1015 queue to osx.13 queue. #96149
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] [PERF] Update osx.1015 queue to osx.13 queue. #96148
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Handle `BBJ_CALLFINALLYRET` block kind when checking for loop exit #96147
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [android] Bump to win 11 helix queue #96139
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix unhandled exception with no managed frames #96138
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix bug in label printing in disasm #96136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix JitOptRepeat around shared constants #96130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: remove bound check for negated ranges #96123
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add runtime module address to SpecialDiagInfo block in createdump and fix missing DotNetRuntimeDebugHeader export #96121
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Change Native AOT ThreadBuffer.m_threadId to OS thread id #96120
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • Add a note on unoptimized IL to feature checks doc #96119
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink

Merged

  • Delete unused CORINFO_FLG_FIELD_PROTECTED #96144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Update osx.1015 queue to osx.13 queue. #96076
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix InternalMethodImplTest w/ R2R #96115
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr
  • JIT ARM64/SVE2: Add increment/decrement from predicate register instructions #94811
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Simplify AdditionalSharedFrameworkToInstallArguments in workloads-testing.targets #96107
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT ARM64-SVE2: Add IF_SVE_DQ_0A, IF_SVE_DR_1A, IF_SVE_DS_2A #95996
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Update the bit field of encoding function names #96082
    arch-arm64-sve
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_CX_4A group #95918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Remove outdated buildtriage.md doc #96127
    area-Meta
  • Use lowercase arm64 in CMakePresets.json #96111
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Improve the hashtable for EEClassHash #94825
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] Extract `src/mono/browser` from `src/mono/wasm` #95940
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Implement more APIs in new TypeBuilder, fix bugs found during testing #95753
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Fix crash when processing aliases that do not point at names #96048
    area-System.Text.Json, source-generator
  • [mono][jit] Optimize the experimental-gshared-mrgctx code #96104
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add dumpers for new loop data structures #96080
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix `CopyStringDictionary` #96093
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • Clarify OS and Arch ownership #95972
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [browser] introduce JSProxyContext #95959
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Browser.targets: Fix .dlls being deployed to `publish/` #96045
    area-Build-mono
  • New exception handling diagnostic fixes #96065
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Lock that uses congestion detection for self-tuning #93879
    area-System.Threading
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • extract side-effects from op1 of GT_COMMA #96077
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Simplify codegen for div/mod #96068
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] Disable NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds #96053
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [release/6.0-staging] Disable NoCallback_RevokedCertificate_NoRevocationChecking_Succeeds #96055
    area-System.Net.Http
  • ObjWriter in C# #95876
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement KMAC #96025
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • [NativeAOT] Fix Lock's usage of NativeRuntimeEventSource.Log to account for recursive accesses during its own class construction #94873
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add emitUnitTests.sh #96064
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • ReadAsStream/CopyTo should reset result/destination stream position #95827
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [aot][browser] Stop throwing in CultureInfo getter #95910
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser][fix] maxParallelDownloads #95870
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.2
  • [release/8.0-staging] Improve the hash function used in the `InstMethodHashTable` #95285
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.2
  • Cleanup some string operating functions #96099
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Sanitize Reg Entries in SerialPort.GetPortNames (Issue 93240) #93242
    community-contribution, area-System.IO.Ports
  • [IGNORE] Gshared mrgctx #96108
    NO-REVIEW
